title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Stampede
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A social media-obsessed traveler is trampled to death when a false fire alarm triggers a stampede in an overcrowded hostel common room during a World Cup screening.

death_teaser: When the crowd moves, you move. Or you don't move again.
